content: That's really helpful, thanks. I especially like the idea of using daily and weekly post ideas to keep my audience engaged. I've been using hashtags consistently across all my social media platforms, which has helped me connect with like-minded users. Speaking of which, I've had some success with my #ThrowbackThursday post on Facebook, which got 5 comments, including 4 comments from family members and old friends. I'm thinking of doing a follow-up post to keep the momentum going. Do you have any ideas for a follow-up post?
